metadata.Title: CVE-2023-41359 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0. There is an out-of-bounds read in bgp_attr_aigp_valid in bgpd/bgp_attr.c because there is no check for the availability of two bytes during AIGP validation.

notes.Note: sbeattie> the quagga project was renamed to frr

criterions.comment: quagga: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
